mapper.select: select nu.id as extendMessageId,n.title as extendMessageName, nu.create_date as extendMessageDate ,n.content as extendMessageContent from notification n inner join notification_user nu on n.id=nu.notification_id where nu.openid=#{openid} limit #{limit}
